summary: Polypropylene (PP) is a very useful plastic made from propylene, a type of chemical. It's strong, heat-resistant, and can be found in many everyday items. This plastic is similar to polyethylene but is a bit harder. It's often used because it doesn't react easily with other chemicals. Polypropylene is the second most popular plastic in the world, showing up in everything from packaging to textiles.
title: Polypropylene
